Parameter.docString: The relative residual tolerance that needs to be achieved by the iterative solver in order for the linear system to be declared converged.
Parameter.name: Convergence Tolerance

Parameter.docString: The maximum number of restarts allowed for each set of RHS solved.
Parameter.name: Maximum Restarts

Parameter.docString: The maximum number of block iterations allowed for each set of RHS solved.
Parameter.name: Maximum Iterations

Parameter.docString: The maximum number of blocks allowed in the Krylov subspace for each set of RHS solved.
Parameter.name: Num Blocks

Parameter.docString: The number of vectors in each block. This number times the number of blocks is the total Krylov subspace dimension.
Parameter.name: Block Size

Parameter.docString: Whether the solver manager should adapt the block size based on the number of RHS to solve.
Parameter.name: Adaptive Block Size

Parameter.docString: What type(s) of solver information should be outputted to the output stream.
Parameter.name: Verbosity

Parameter.docString: What style is used for the solver information outputted to the output stream.
Parameter.name: Output Style

Parameter.docString: How often convergence information should be outputted to the output stream.
Parameter.name: Output Frequency

Parameter.docString: A reference-counted pointer to the output stream where all solver output is sent.
Parameter.name: Output Stream

Parameter.docString: When convergence information is printed, only show the maximum relative residual norm when the block size is greater than one.
Parameter.name: Show Maximum Residual Norm Only

Parameter.docString: Whether the solver manager should use the flexible variant of GMRES.
Parameter.name: Flexible Gmres

Parameter.docString: Whether the explicitly computed residual should be used in the convergence test.
Parameter.name: Explicit Residual Test

Parameter.docString: The type of scaling used in the implicit residual convergence test.
Parameter.name: Implicit Residual Scaling

Parameter.docString: The type of scaling used in the explicit residual convergence test.
Parameter.name: Explicit Residual Scaling

Parameter.docString: The string to use as a prefix for the timer labels.
Parameter.name: Timer Label

Parameter.docString: The type of orthogonalization to use: DGKS, ICGS, or IMGS.
Parameter.name: Orthogonalization

Parameter.docString: The constant used by DGKS orthogonalization to determine whether another step of classical Gram-Schmidt is necessary.
Parameter.name: Orthogonalization Constant
